Description.en: Identifies the company business unit responsible for the record (values localized as BBU, HBU, CBU, ZBU); used for organizational aggregation and filtering.
Specifies the product name associated with the record; used to group and analyze performance by product.
Geographical region (values localized to Japanese: 北米, 欧州, アジア); used for regional segmentation, reporting, and comparisons.

Localized country name derived from the former Site column (e.g., 米国=USA, カナダ=Canada, メキシコ=Mexico, ドイツ=Germany, フランス=France, 英国=UK, 日本=Japan, 中国=China, 韓国=Korea); used for country-level analysis and joins.
Numeric fiscal year extracted from the original composite Fiscal_Quarter field (e.g., 2023); used for period hierarchies and time-series grouping.
Fiscal quarter code (Q1–Q4) separated from year; used for intra-year trend and comparative analysis.
Total revenue amount for the record (currency consistent across dataset); used for financial reporting and KPI calculations.
Annual Operating Plan target value; used for planning comparisons and variance analysis against actual Revenue.
